summary: Container class that aggregates all outputs produced by the GroupViT multimodal model in TensorFlow, including optional loss, similarity scores between images and texts, pixel‑wise segmentation scores, projected embeddings for each modality, and the raw outputs of the underlying text and vision sub‑models.
business_intent: Enable downstream applications such as contrastive image‑text retrieval, semantic segmentation, and further processing by providing a unified, easy‑to‑handle structure of model results within TensorFlow pipelines.
